name: Moverio Cardboard
tagline: Easily develop VR apps for Moverio BT 200 using Google Cardboard
body:
![Logo](http://i.imgur.com/6bhOzWL.png)

### Welcome to Moverio Cardboard.
Now you can easily develop Virtual Reality apps for Epson Moverio BT 200. This project is a fork of Google Cardboard (0.4.10) optimized and preconfigured for Moverio. The SDK allows you to easily adapt your Unity 3D app or build a new VR experience from scratch.

### Features
We’ve crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and click 'Continue to layouts' to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved.

### Preconfigured and Optimized for Moverio
![Preconfigured](http://i.imgur.com/e8NRN6g.png)

### Authors and Contributors
Original fork and Moverio optimization by @hololeo. Contributions welcome!
![HoloLeo Logo](http://i.imgur.com/dMOUMas.jpg) 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
